pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"概览","depth":2},{"url":"#react-conf-2021","depth":2,"text":"React Conf 2021 "},{"url":"#react-18-keynote","depth":3,"text":"React 18 Keynote "},{"url":"#react-18-for-application-developers","depth":3,"text":"React 18 for Application Developers "},{"url":"#streaming-server-rendering-with-suspense","depth":3,"text":"Streaming Server Rendering with Suspense "},{"url":"#the-first-react-working-group","depth":3,"text":"The first React working group "},{"url":"#react-developer-tooling","depth":3,"text":"React Developer Tooling "},{"url":"#react-without-memo","depth":3,"text":"React without memo "},{"url":"#react-docs-keynote","depth":3,"text":"React docs keynote "},{"url":"#and-more","depth":3,"text":"And more… "},{"url":"#older-videos","depth":2,"text":"Older videos "},{"url":"#react-conf-2019","depth":3,"text":"React Conf 2019 "},{"url":"#react-conf-2018","depth":3,"text":"React Conf 2018 "},{"url":"#reactjs-conf-2017","depth":3,"text":"React.js Conf 2017 "},{"url":"#reactjs-conf-2016","depth":3,"text":"React.js Conf 2016 "},{"url":"#reactjs-conf-2015","depth":3,"text":"React.js Conf 2015 "},{"url":"#rethinking-best-practices","depth":3,"text":"Rethinking Best Practices "},{"url":"#introduction-to-react","depth":3,"text":"Introduction to React "}]

[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"Videos dedicated to the discussion of React and the React ecosystem."}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"react-conf-2021","children":"React Conf 2021 "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"react-18-keynote","children":"React 18 Keynote "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"In the keynote, we shared our vision for the future of React starting with React 18."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Watch the full keynote from ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/acdlite","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Andrew Clark"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_jstejada","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Juan Tejada"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/potetotes","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lauren Tan"}],", and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rickhanlonii","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Rick Hanlon"}]," here:"]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/FZ0cG47msEk","title":"YouTube video player"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"react-18-for-application-developers","children":"React 18 for Application Developers "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For a demo of upgrading to React 18, see ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/shrutikapoor08","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Shruti Kapoor"}],"’s talk here:"]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ytudH8je5ko","title":"YouTube video player"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"streaming-server-rendering-with-suspense","children":"Streaming Server Rendering with Suspense "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"React 18 also includes improvements to server-side rendering performance using Suspense."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Streaming server rendering lets you generate HTML from React components on the server, and stream that HTML to your users. In React 18, you can use ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Suspense"}]," to break down your app into smaller independent units which can be streamed independently of each other without blocking the rest of the app. This means users will see your content sooner and be able to start interacting with it much faster."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For a deep dive, see ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/shaundai","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Shaundai Person"}],"’s talk here:"]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pj5N-Khihgc","title":"YouTube video player"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"the-first-react-working-group","children":"The first React working group "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For React 18, we created our first Working Group to collaborate with a panel of experts, developers, library maintainers, and educators. Together we worked to create our gradual adoption strategy and refine new APIs such as ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"useId"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"useSyncExternalStore"}],", and ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"useInsertionEffect"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For an overview of this work, see ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/aakansha1216","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Aakansha’ Doshi"}],"’s talk:"]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qn7gRClrC9U","title":"YouTube video player"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"react-developer-tooling","children":"React Developer Tooling "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"To support the new features in this release, we also announced the newly formed React DevTools team and a new Timeline Profiler to help developers debug their React apps."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For more information and a demo of new DevTools features, see ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/brian_d_vaughn","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Brian Vaughn"}],"’s talk:"]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/oxDfrke8rZg","title":"YouTube video player"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"react-without-memo","children":"React without memo "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Looking further into the future, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/Huxpro","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Xuan Huang (黄玄)"}]," shared an update from our React Labs research into an auto-memoizing compiler. Check out this talk for more information and a demo of the compiler prototype:"]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/lGEMwh32soc","title":"YouTube video player"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"react-docs-keynote","children":"React docs keynote "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rachelnabors","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Rachel Nabors"}]," kicked off a section of talks about learning and designing with React with a keynote about our investment in React’s new docs (",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/blog/2023/03/16/introducing-react-dev","children":"now shipped as react.dev"}],"):"]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/mneDaMYOKP8","title":"YouTube video player"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"and-more","children":"And more… "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"We also heard talks on learning and designing with React:"}]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Debbie O’Brien: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/-7odLW_hG7s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Things I learnt from the new React docs"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Sarah Rainsberger: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/5X-WEQflCL0","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Learning in the Browser"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Linton Ye: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/7cPWmID5XAk","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"The ROI of Designing with React"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Delba de Oliveira: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/zL8cz2W0z34","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Interactive playgrounds with React"}],"."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Talks from the Relay, React Native, and PyTorch teams:"}]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Robert Balicki: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/lhVGdErZuN4","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Re-introducing Relay"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Eric Rozell and Steven Moyes: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/9L4FFrvwJwY","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native Desktop"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Roman Rädle: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/NLj73vrc2I8","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"On-device Machine Learning for React Native"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"And talks from the community on accessibility, tooling, and Server Components:"}]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Daishi Kato: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/oPfSC5bQPR8","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React 18 for External Store Libraries"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Diego Haz: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/dcm8fjBfro8","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Building Accessible Components in React 18"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Tafu Nakazaki: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/S4a0QlsH0pU","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Accessible Japanese Form Components with React"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Lyle Troxell: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/b3l4WxipFsE","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"UI tools for artists"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Helen Lin: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/HS6vIYkSNks","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Hydrogen + React 18"}],"."]}],"
"]}],"

",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rethinking-best-practices","children":"Rethinking Best Practices "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Pete Hunt’s talk at JSConf EU 2013 covers three topics: throwing out the notion of templates and building views with JavaScript, “re-rendering” your entire application when your data changes, and a lightweight implementation of the DOM and events - (2013 - 0h30m)."}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"title":"Pete Hunt: React: Rethinking Best Practices - JSConf EU 2013","src":"https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/x7cQ3mrcKaY"}],"
